organizations: Aqua Hospitality and Aston Hotels & Resorts Announce Rebranding Aqua Hospitality and Aston Hotels

thread.title: Aqua Hospitality and Aston Hotels & Resorts Announce Rebranding
thread.title_full: Aqua Hospitality and Aston Hotels & Resorts Announce Rebranding

title: Aqua Hospitality and Aston Hotels & Resorts Announce Rebranding
text:
Aqua Hospitality and Aston Hotels & Resorts Announce Rebranding August 17, 2015 
Hawaii-based hotel companies, Aqua Hospitality and Aston Hotels & Resorts, will now be integrated under one brand, Aqua-Aston Hospitality. According to a statement from the companies, the two integrated under one brand to provide better services to its travel partners, including direct connectivity improvements that will make the booking process easier, a larger combined team of sales reps and a cash-back bonus program for travel agents. The new Aqua-Aston Hospitality name will represent five different brands: Aston Hotels & Resorts, Stylish, Lite Hotels, Instinct Hotel Collection, and Maui Condo & Homes. For more information about the rebranding, visit the Aqua-Aston website . 0
